pullrequest.title: Fixes -inf laser reading being displayed as +inf (gazebo 7)

content.raw:
I see, got you.

Just to confirm again, [this line](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/870752f17055d99371618f5b2114fa52e47f24e4/gazebo/gui/viewers/LaserView.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#LaserView.cc-487) in LaserView checks `inf` as well and set the  `noHitRange` to max range (which is same the behavior as the LaserVisual before the changes in this PR) so we don't need to clamp the readings?
content.html:
I see, got you.

Just to confirm again, this line in LaserView checks inf as well and set the noHitRange to max range (which is same the behavior as the LaserVisual before the changes in this PR) so we don't need to clamp the readings?
